      • build

        public ExpandedCds build()

      • buySellProtection

        public ExpandedCds.Builder buySellProtection(BuySell buySellProtection)
        Sets whether the CDS is buy or sell.

        A value of 'Buy' implies that the fee leg payments are being paid, and protection is being bought. A value of 'Sell' implies that the fee leg payments are being received, and protection is being sold.

        Parameters:
        buySellProtection - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • currency

        public ExpandedCds.Builder currency(Currency currency)
        Sets the primary currency.

        This is the currency of the CDS and the currency that payments are made in.

        Parameters:
        currency - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • startDate

        public ExpandedCds.Builder startDate(LocalDate startDate)
        Sets the date that the CDS nominally starts in terms of premium payments.

        The number of days in the first period, and thus the amount of the first premium payment, is counted from this date.

        This should be adjusted according business day and holidays.

        Parameters:
        startDate - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • endDate

        public ExpandedCds.Builder endDate(LocalDate endDate)
        Sets the date that the contract expires and protection ends.

        Any default after this date does not trigger a payment. The protection ends at the end of day.

        This is an adjusted date and can fall on a holiday or weekend.

        Parameters:
        endDate - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • businessDayAdjustment

        public ExpandedCds.Builder businessDayAdjustment(BusinessDayAdjustment businessDayAdjustment)
        Sets the business day adjustment to apply to the start and end dates.
        Parameters:
        businessDayAdjustment - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • payAccruedOnDefault

        public ExpandedCds.Builder payAccruedOnDefault(boolean payAccruedOnDefault)
        Sets whether the accrued premium is paid in the event of a default.
        Parameters:
        payAccruedOnDefault - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • paymentInterval

        public ExpandedCds.Builder paymentInterval(Period paymentInterval)
        Sets the nominal period between premium payments, such as 3 months or 6 months.

        Regular payments will be made at the specified periodic frequency.

        Parameters:
        paymentInterval - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null

      • stubConvention

        public ExpandedCds.Builder stubConvention(StubConvention stubConvention)
        Sets the stub convention to use.

        This may be 'ShortInitial', 'LongInitial', 'ShortFinal', or 'LongFinal'. The values 'None' and 'Both' are not allowed.

        Parameters:
        stubConvention - the new value, not null
        Returns:
        this, for chaining, not null
